text: "Girl" is a song by English rock band the Beatles. It was first released on the band's 1965 album Rubber Soul. It was written by John Lennon, but listed as Lennonâ€“McCartney. It is a sad love song. ==Personnel== According to Ian MacDonald, except as noted: *John Lennon - lead vocals, acoustic guitar *Paul McCartney - backing vocals, bass guitar *George Harrison - backing vocals, lead acoustic guitar, 12-string guitar *Ringo Starr - drums ==References== ==Sources== * * * * Category:The Beatles songs Category:1965 songs Category:1960s ballads
title: Girl (Beatles song)
